high_descs: turn left move to reach the bed
After reaching the bedroom, take the butterknife from the bed.
take the knife and move to reach the desklamp
then reach the desklamp and to power on the desklamp
anns.task_desc: take the ButterKnife and power on the DeskLamp

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the bed.
pick up the butterknife in the knife.
Turn straight go to the desklamp.
move to the knife switch on the desklamp
anns.task_desc: Pick up ButterKnife and move to DeskLamp, then switch on the lamp.

high_descs: Brings the knife closer to the desklamp.
The desklamp comes on when the knife comes to the bedroom.
anns.task_desc: When the ButterKnife is brought near the DeskLamp, the DeskLamp lights up
